items.title: CZ Pumps Aster 25% with Tweet! Crypto Majors Selloff! Trump distances from CZ!

Among top movers, ASTER (+8%) and TRUMP (+3%) led the gains. ASTER initially surged 25% after CZ announced he had bought the token and planned to hold it long-term, though it has since retraced most of that move.
